subject: Re: Stupid but True
msgSnippet: Yes as Moira points out, one can t use yahoo, google or the other email composing web interfaces but must use a trick to get the html FONT tags in by using
messageBody:
Yes as Moira points out, one can't use yahoo, google or the other email composing web interfaces but must use a "trick" to get the html FONT tags in by using another email client or some fancy copying and pasting into a new email message. Certainly just reading and replying on the forum alone doesn't work (Alas). I don't know if any of this saves effort over just writing out Key-At-Roe but I had some hope for a moment.

--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "Moira O'Brien" <mj@...> wrote:
-----------------------------

F TNk F andDstAnd nQ.  /JDOm font ddnt wDk bikoz HX znt a VnikOd vDSn.
 
A a matD v intDest, F Am tFpN Hs in /windOz mEl.  `en F trFd t tFp t in /gMgl mEl it did not wDk.
 
/mQra

Be a better pen pal. Text or chat with friends inside Yahoo! Mail. See how.

Yes as Moira points out, one can't use yahoo, google or the other email composing web interfaces but must use a "trick" to get the html FONT tags in by using another email client or some fancy copying and pasting into a new email message. Certainly just reading and replying on the forum alone doesn't work (Alas). I don't know if any of this saves effort over just writing out Key-At-Roe but I had some hope for a moment.

--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "Moira O'Brien" <mj@...> wrote:
-----------------------------

F TNk F andDstAnd nQ.  /JDOm font ddnt wDk bikoz HX znt a VnikOd vDSn.  
 A a matD v intDest, F Am tFpN Hs in /windOz mEl.  `en F trFd t tFp t in /gMgl mEl it did not wDk.
  
/mQra
